title: Lift the Shadow Curse
content: point on, you can have Halsin follow you like any other character. This is however not required to complete the quest. Find and talk to Oliver. You may need to play hide and seek with him. He will hide first near the cart outside of the small hut, and then inside the house again. Merely walking close to him reveals him. Ask Oliver to reunite with Thaniel.
